title: Function behavior from tabular values of function

content.prompt: If f is twice-differentiable on the interval 1 ≤ x ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ , which of the following statements could be true?

choices.label: f' is negative and decreasing for  1 ≤ x ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ .

f' is negative and increasing for  1 ≤ x ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ .

f' is positive and decreasing for  1 ≤ x ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ .

f' is positive and increasing for  1 ≤ x ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ .

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
